amendment.description: To amend title V of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a full-service community schools grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2100 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 44. Record Vote Number: 246.

action.text: Amendment SA 2100 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104) To amend title V of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a full-service community schools grant program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2100 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 44. Record Vote Number: 246.
